short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically redirect to Amazon Smile to start earning money for the charity of your choice!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Love shopping on Amazon but struggle to remember to use the Amazon Smile program to contribute to your favorite charities? Use the Cash Cow extension to automatically redirect to Amazon Smile so you never miss an opportunity to do good while you shop!
